name: ss-hugo
description: Our starting point for Hugo theme development.

scripts.css:build: npm run css:build-Dev & npm run css:build-Min & wait
scripts.postcss:build-Min: echo [SS-HUGO] main.css built and minified to theme!
scripts.postjs:build-Bundle: npm run js:copy && echo [SS-HUGO] main.js rebuilt!
scripts.postjs:build-Vendor: npm run js:copy && echo [SS-HUGO] vendor.js rebuilt! and uglified
scripts.postjs:build-VendorHome: npm run js:copy && echo [SS-HUGO] vendorHome.js rebuilt and uglified!
scripts.js:copy: uglifyjs static/js/bundle.js && rsync -a static/js ../$npm_package_config_themeName/static & rsync -a static/js ../$npm_package_config_themeName/static & wait
scripts.js:build: npm run js:build-Bundle & npm run js:build-Vendor & npm run js:build-VendorHome & wait
scripts.js:watch: npm run js:watch-Bundle & npm run js:watch-Vendor & npm run js:watch-VendorHome & wait
scripts.build: npm run js:build & npm run css:build & npm run layouts:copy & wait
scripts.watch: npm run js:watch & npm run css:watch & npm run layouts:watch & wait
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch

author: Pixel & Kraft
